ucimlr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Travel Review Ratings

Source: R/travel_review_ratings.R
travel_review_ratings.Rd

This data set is populated by capturing user ratings from Google reviews. Reviews on attractions from 24 categories across Europe are considered. Google user rating ranges from 1 to 5 and average user rating per category is calculated.

travel_review_ratings

Format

A data frame with 5456 observations on the following 25 variables.

  1. user id

  2. churches

  3. resorts

  4. beaches

  5. parks

  6. theatres

  7. museums

  8. malls

  9. zoo

  10. restaurants

  11. pubs/bars

  12. local services

  13. burger/pizza shops

  14. hotels/other lodgings

  15. juice bars

  16. art galleries

  17. dance clubs

  18. swimming pools

  19. gyms

  20. bakeries

  21. beauty & spas

  22. cafes

  23. view points

  24. monuments

  25. gardens

Source

Shini Renjith, shinirenjith '@' gmail.com

Details

Google reviews on attractions from 24 categories across Europe are considered. Google user rating ranges from 1 to 5 and average user rating per category is calculated.

References

Renjith, Shini, A. Sreekumar, and M. Jathavedan. 2018. Evaluation of Partitioning Clustering Algorithms for Processing Social Media Data in Tourism Domaina.

https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/00485/

https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Tarvel+Review+Ratings
